name: pp-up
effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Increases a selected move's max PP by 20% its original max PP, to a maximum of 1.6×.  Increases happiness by 5/3/2.
short_effect: Raises a move's max PP by 20%.

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
Raises the maximum
PP of a selected
move.

Raises the maximum
PP of a selected
move.
